remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 健康監視，可讓管理已部署的 Web 應用程式的生產環境和作業人員。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空間包含負責封裝應用程式健全狀況狀態資料和負責處理此資料提供者類型的健全狀況事件類型。The namespace contains the health event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它也會包含有助於管理健全狀況事件的支援型別。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 類別是建置監視 Web 事件及傳送電子郵件，針對選取的事件提供者的基底類別。The class is a base class for building providers that monitor Web events and send email for selected events. 這個類別支援.NET Framework 基礎結構和非預期要繼承自或直接從您的程式碼使用。This class supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be inherited from or used directly from your code. > [!NOTE] > 在大部分情況下您將能夠實作時，使用 ASP.NET 健康監視類型，而您會藉由指定的值控制健全狀況監視系統``組態區段。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `` configuration section. 您也可以衍生自健全狀況監視類型的類型來建立您自己的自訂事件和提供者。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 如需建立自訂提供者的範例，請參閱[How to： 實作健全狀況監視自訂提供者範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bbb1c959-e6e4-42b2-be62-49b7ca5ab72c)。For an example of creating a custom provider, see [How to: Implement the Health Monitoring Custom Provider Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bbb1c959-e6e4-42b2-be62-49b7ca5ab72c).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 需要事件緩衝區排清時，健全狀況監視系統會呼叫這個方法。This method is called by the health-monitoring system when an event buffer flush is required. 當事件緩衝區排清，通知就會發生，且整個事件緩衝區越好，而不論長度為何傳送到最少的訊息的收件者已耗用時間的最後一個通知。When the event buffer is flushed, a notification occurs and the entire event buffer is sent to the recipients in as few messages as possible, regardless of the length of time elapsed since the last notification.
